messages.subject: Subscribe, please, to my blog
messages.msgSnippet: https://albuquerqueallive.blogspot.com Please subscribe to this if you re interested in the possibility of attending the Always Learning Live Symposium in
messages.messageBody:
https://albuquerqueallive.blogspot.com

Please subscribe to this if you're interested in the possibility of attending the Always Learning Live Symposium in Albuquerque in late December.

If you know you can't attend, please subscribe if you're interested in supporting the work I do here, on my site, and in person. My fundraiser this year will have to do with that gathering, and a trip up the mountain! :-) It will be announced there, sometime in November and if you're an e-mail subscriber you'll get the notice!

This week I will introduce speakers, and there will be links to other things about them, so subscribe if you're interested in knowing more about other unschooling families (with photos, which we can't use here).

Subscribe if you have friends you think would benefit from three days of unschooling discussion with experienced unschoolers (and a traditional art form, rangoli; and some table games at night; and a trip up to the top of the Sandia mountains by tram so we can see A LONG WAY).

Thank you all for reading, and for your help and encouragement here and otherwheres. :-)

Sandra
